page.title: 07ECOLOGY - FOOTPATHS
page.content: FOOTPATH 30/53 Pont Alltycadno to Pontantwn starts at Footpath 30/52 in our block, through fields, over footbridge along mill race, ends on B4309. FOOTPATH 30/56A Pontantwn to Gwempa starts on B4309 through fields to Gwempa. FOOTPATH 30/57 Gwempa to Pantymeillion starts on Ffynnonwen-Lancwm road through fields, near stream, passing Pantgwinau, Blaenmeillion and Pantymeillion farms, ends on minor road south of B4309. FOOTPATH 30/58 Blaenmeillion to Halfway House starts at Blaenmeillion, through fields, ends on B4309. FOOTPATH 30/59 Via Danyrallt starts at Ffynnonwen-Lancwm road through fields and woodland passing Danyrallt farm, ends on Fan Kidwelly road near stream.
